title: Bond Special: Matt Gourley on Casino Royale
itunes:title: Bond Special: Matt Gourley on Casino Royale
description:
Well well, Bond fans - get ready to be delighted. Chuck's guest this week is not only one of the nicest dudes in the entertainment biz, but he's a real deal James Bond specialist. His knowledge goes deep, folks. Sit in on this great conversation between Chuck and Matt Gourley as they chat about all things Bond, and then hone in on Matt's pick, Casino Royale. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
